mapper.select: SELECT *, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM complaints c INNER JOIN ReplyComplaints rc ON c.complaintsId = rc.complaintsId) AS replycnt FROM complaints c LEFT JOIN complaintsResult cr ON c.complaintsResult = cr.`NO`
mapper.insert: insert into complaints(complaintsTitle, complaintsContent, complaintsWriter) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update complaints set complaintsTitle = #{title}, complaintsContent = #{content}, complaintsWriter = #{writer} where complaintsId = #{no}
update complaints set complaintsResult = #{result} where complaintsId = #{no}
